Inglewood.\u00c1nimo Inglewood Charter High School:
Ánimo Inglewood Charter High School is a public charter school in Inglewood, California, operated by Green Dot Public Schools of Los Angeles.
It was the second Green Dot school to be established, due in part to the success of Ánimo Leadership Charter High School. It opened in August 2002, with 145 new students, adding a new freshman class of 140 every year until 2006, when it reached full capacity to approximately 525 students.
